conversation_history.content:
Hello! I'm your hookah recommendation assistant. I'm here to help you find the perfect hookah based on your preferences and budget.

I can help you with:
 Finding hookahs based on your needs
 Budget-friendly recommendations
 Color and design preferences
 Portable vs home hookah options
 LED and special features

What kind of hookah are you looking for today?

Great!  For home use.

 **Here are my top 2 recommendations for you:**

**1. og Hobo Hookah - Portable Hookah**
 Price: Rs. 999.00
 Available Colors: Silver, Red, Brown, Blue, Golden, Black
 Features:  Portable,  nan" tall
 Popularly known as hobo set, some people say it hobo hukka as well. It helps in converting any bottle into hookah, jack daniels, blue label, black lab...
 **[View Product](https://shopdop.in/products/og-hobo-hookah-portable-hookah)**

**2. Acrylic Hoob Cube Hookah**
 Price: Rs. 7,850.00
 Features:  Portable,  LED Light,  nan" tall
 
 **[View Product](https://shopdop.in/products/hoob-cube-hookah)**

 **What would you like to know more about?**
• More details about any of these products?
• Different price range or features?
• Other color options?
